text.section:
A direct wine shipper may renew its direct wine shipper's permit each year if the direct wine shipper:
Is otherwise entitled to have a direct wine shipper's permit;
Provides to the Office of the Comptroller a copy of its current permit; and
Pays to the Office of the Comptroller a renewal fee of $200.

The Office of the Comptroller may deny a renewal application of a direct wine shipper who fails to:
File a tax return required under this title;
Pay a fee or tax when due; or
After receiving notice, comply with a provision of this article or a regulation that the Office of the Comptroller adopts under this article.
